description:
Katsura Kotaro of Choshu and Saigo Takamori of Satsuma. These two would be the lyncpins of the Joi revolution that disposed of Tokugawa rule, but they didn`t always get along.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dou Naru? Dou Naru? Sacchou Doumei!
What`s Going to Happen? What Should We Do? The Satcho Alliance!
どうなる? どうする? 薩長同盟!
